posts.post_content:
Looking to pick up the last few catchers I need in the colored S74 set.

I have picked up 10 of the 15 catchers in this set.

Looking for clean examples of the remaining 5 players:

Bill Bergen
Charles Dooin
George "Peaches" Graham
Pat Moran
George "Admiral" Schlei

I'll pay strong for nice examples of these five (5) players.

Thanks,

Patrick

Down to just needing just Bill Bergen, Peaches Graham, and Admiral Schlei to complete my run of catchers in the S74-2 set.

Looking for Ex condition silks without needle holes. Will pay strong for nice examples.

Thanks,

Patrick

Crossed Bill Bergen off my want list today.

Looking to purchase Ex condition S74-2 silks of Peaches Graham and Admiral Schlei to complete my run of catchers in the S74-2 colored silk set.

Thanks in advance,

Patrick
